TEXT: Ceramic Fish (Cards at the shop cost 20 less Gold.)
Maw Bank (Whenever you climb a floor, store 12 Gold. Right click to smash open and gain all Gold inside.)
Strawberry (Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7. At the end of combat, heal 1 HP.)
Darkstone Periapt (Whenever you draw a Curse, draw 1 card.)
Pear (Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b10. Whenever you heal, heal an additional #b1 HP.)
Strike Dummy (Basic and Common Attacks deal 3 additional damage.)
